properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item BR-1 for Azure VMware Solution

features.featureDescription: The service can be backed up by the Azure Backup service.
features.featureGuidance:
Use Azure Backup Server (as part of Azure Backup) to perform the VM-level backup. 
Azure Backup Server can store backup data to:
Disk: For short-term storage, Azure Backup Server backs up data to disk pools.
Azure cloud: For both short-term and long-term storage off-premises, Azure Backup Server data stored in disk pools can be backed up to the Microsoft Azure cloud by using Azure Backup.

features.featureDescription: Service supports its own native backup capability (if not using Azure Backup).
features.featureGuidance: There is no current Microsoft guidance for this feature configuration. Please review and determine if your organization wants to configure this security feature.
